ARTICLE I
Definitions
Section 1.01. Defined Terms.
"Indebtedness" means all obligations for borrowed money.
"Permitted Debt" means debt permitted under Section 7.01.
ARTICLE VII
Negative Covenants
Section 7.01. Limitation on Indebtedness.
(a) The Borrower may incur Permitted Debt.
(b) The Borrower shall not incur other Indebtedness.
